channel.title: Cannot find or load main class gui
channel.description:
Everything compiles ok, but when I try to run my client, the command prompt quickly opens and closes and says something like, "Cannot find or load main class gui".
[code]@echo off Title Running Client... cd ./ "C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32 exit[/code]
This is what my Run file looks like.
Anybody know what is wrong?

item.title: Cannot find or load main class gui
